Package neqsim.thermodynamicoperations.flashops

Class TPgradientFlash

java.lang.Object
neqsim.thermodynamicoperations.BaseOperation
neqsim.thermodynamicoperations.flashops.Flash
neqsim.thermodynamicoperations.flashops.TPgradientFlash
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable, OperationInterface
public class TPgradientFlash extends Flash
TPgradientFlash class handles thermodynamic calculations with temperature and pressure gradients.
Author:
ESOL
